name: Islander Provider
description:
Keep your islanders happy by collecting the resources they need:

- Wood, so that islanders can expand the island.

- Rum, so that islanders can stay happy.

- Food, so that islanders can not die.

Collecting resources will buy you time for the corresponding resource timer. If any of these resources run out then your islanders will not be happy...

Created for the GameDev. Comuunity Game Jam.
